mapper.select: select a.material_number as "number", a.material_item as "item", a.material_name as "name", b.count as "count", c.in_count as "inCount", c.expiration_limit as "limit" from material a left join logistics_order_details b on a.material_number = b.material_number left join logistics_in c on b.details_order_number = c.details_order_number order by a.material_number

select a.material_number , a.material_name, b.count, c.in_day, c.in_count from material a join logistics_order_details b on a.material_number = b.material_number join logistics_in c on b.details_order_number = c.details_order_number where a.material_number = #{number}
